description: Relocated in via Padre Giacinto 20.The restaurant takes its name from its chef Andrea, while the phrase “Sapori Montani” (mountain flavours) gives a good indication of the type of cuisine served here, from the local truffle-flavoured sausage – which has made Palazzolo Acreide’s name famous throughout Sicily – to trout, black suckling pig and excellent cheeses.
